IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDING AFFORDABLE AND ACCESSIBLE HOUSING FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES AND OTHERS IN NEED
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF PREFERRED PROPERTIES IS TO CREATE AND MANAGE AFFORDABLE AND ACCESSIBLE HOUSING FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES, SENIORS, AND OTHERS IN NEED THAT WILL FACILITATE THEIR CHOICE OF COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING TO PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE A, PART II, LINE 10, EXPLANATION OF OTHER INCOME:
Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: TENANT REV MISC INC - 2013 AMOUNT: $ 8,021. 2014 AMOUNT: $ 8,105. 2015 AMOUNT: $ 4,091. 2016 AMOUNT: $ 10,080. 2017 AMOUNT: $ 13,407.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PREFERRED PROPERTIES, INC. IS AN AGENT FOR FUNDS GIVEN BY THE CITY OF TOLEDO TO AUTUMN WOOD II.

MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION IS REQUIRED TO DETERMINE WHETHER A TAX POSITION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT TO BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE APPLICABLE TAXING AUTHORITY, INCLUDING RESOLUTION OF ANY RELATED APPEALS OR LITIGATION PROCESSES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. MANAGEMENT OF THE ORGANIZATION IS NOT AWARE OF ANY TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE THAT THE TOTAL AMOUNTS OF UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS WILL SIGNIFICANTLY CHANGE IN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS. HOWEVER, MANAGEMENT'S CONCLUSIONS MAY BE SUBJECT TO REVIEW AND ADJUSTMENT AT A LATER DATE BASED ON FACTORS INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, NEW TAX LAWS, REGULATIONS, AND ADMINISTRATIVE INTERPRETATIONS (INCLUDING RELEVANT COURT DECISIONS). THE ORGANIZATION'S FEDERAL TAX RETURNS FOR THE PRIOR THREE FISCAL YEARS REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.
PART I COLUMN B REPRESENTS THE TOTAL NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS RECEIVED IN CURRENT YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE COMMITTEES OF THE GOVERNING BODY WITH AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PREFERRED PROPERTIES, INC. PROVIDED THE GOVERNING BODY WITH A COPY OF THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 FOR REVIEW AND COMMENTS BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PREFERRED PROPERTIES, INC. REGULARLY AND CONSISTENTLY MONITORS AND ENFORCES COMPLIANCE WITH ITS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PREFERRED PROPERTIES, INC. BOARD REVIEWS AND APPROVES COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR REVIEWS AND APPROVES COMPENSATION FOR ALL OTHER OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES. ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, COMPARABILITY DATA AND CONTEMPORANEOUS SUBSTANTIATION ARE USED IN THE DECISION PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
THERE HAS BEEN NO CHANGE TO THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS OR SELECTION PROCESS DURING THE TAX YEAR.
